DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine electrical stimulation ( small level electricity ) reduce post-stroke shoulder pain . This study involve device call Smartpatch System . The Smartpatch System deliver mild electrical stimulation muscle shoulder . The Smartpatch System include small wire ( call `` Lead '' ) place skin muscle shoulder . It also include device worn body delivers stimulation ( call Smartpatch Stimulator ) .
DOC.brief_title: Electrical Stimulation Treatment Chronic Post-Stroke Shoulder Pain Using Smartpatch System
